data.title: Farewell Message To Coworker: 80 Ways Of Saying Goodbye
data.meta_description: Stuck in a puddle of how to say goodbye to a colleague? Find the right words for your farewell message to coworker with 80 examples.
data.text:
Are you struggling with finding the right words to say in a farewell message to coworker? Writing a farewell message can be challenging, especially when you want to express your appreciation for your coworker.

You might wonder how to balance being professional and showing your relationship with your coworker. I can help you brainstorm ideas or find the right tone for your message. Let's work together to create a heartfelt and memorable farewell message that your coworker will cherish.

Saying goodbye to coworkers outside work is much easier than leaving them a farewell note or email. However, you’re uncomfortable catching up on Friday night drinks with all your colleagues. Sometimes, you must scrape through a farewell message to make them feel appreciated.

Here are 40 ways to say goodbye to your favorite colleague or any random coworker at work to make things easier. You cannot close things with a simple “Great working with you!”

80 Perfect Farewell Messages For Coworkers Leaving

A departing coworker is usually slightly emotional while leaving the workplace. Your farewell message to coworkers can have a positive impact on their minds. You can send it as a farewell email or a simple text message.

If they’ve already left, you can even send a farewell letter. To make your life simpler, we’ve curated or compiled a list of farewell messages to a colleague in the following categories:

General farewell messages

Farewell messages for a work friend

Farewell messages for office managers

Farewell messages for a favorite office colleague

Funny & short farewell messages

Farewell message to coworker/mentor

Casual & friendly farewell messages

Farewell messages to a coworker from upper management

via GIPHY

General Farewell Messages

It's hard to say goodbye to a great colleague like you, but we are happy to see you moving on to new opportunities. Wishing you all the best in your future endeavors!

You've been a valued team member, and we'll miss your positive attitude and energy around the office. Keep up the great work in your next adventure!

As you are stepping into your stone, we want to express our sincere gratitude for your contributions to the team. You've helped us achieve many successes, and we'll always remember the great times we shared. Best of luck!

Seeing you go is bittersweet, but we know you're heading toward great things. Thanks for your dedication and hard work, and we wish you all the best in your future endeavors.

Your presence in the office will be sorely missed, but we're grateful for our time working together. Best of luck as you take the next step in your career!

You've been an integral part of our team, and we'll miss your contributions and unique perspectives. Thanks for everything you've done for us, and best of luck in your future endeavors!

It's been a pleasure working alongside you, and we're sad to see you go. However, we know you'll continue to do great things wherever you go. All the best to you!

Saying goodbye to a coworker like you is never easy, but we're excited to see the amazing things you'll accomplish in the future. Thanks for everything, and best of luck on your journey!

You've inspired us all, and we're grateful for the opportunity to work with you. Your contributions won't be forgotten, and we wish you all the best in your future endeavors!

You're leaving big shoes to fill, but we know you're off to do great things. Thanks for your hard work and dedication, and we wish you all the best in your next adventure!

Farewell Messages for a Work Friend

Hey [Name], it will be weird not having you around here to gossip and joke around with. You've been an awesome coworker and an even better friend. Good luck with your next adventure!

We'll miss you around here, especially your witty jokes and contagious laughter. Thanks for being an awesome colleague and making work a little more bearable. Keep in touch!

It's hard to say goodbye to a coworker who's also your partner in crime, but we're excited to see what you'll achieve in your new role. Don't forget to visit us and bring some good energy back!

Working with you has been a blast; we're sad to see you go. But we're sure your new coworkers are in for a treat. Keep being your awesome self, and don't forget to share some of that humor and charisma!

Working with you has been a wild ride, and we're grateful for all the great memories we've made together. It's been a pleasure working with you, and even better to call you a friend. Keep being awesome!

Saying goodbye to someone as hilarious and fun as you are never easy, but we're excited to see what you'll accomplish. Keep making people laugh and spreading joy wherever you go!

We will miss your amazing sense of humor and lightheartedness around the office. You've been a true joy to work with, and we'll always remember our great times. Best of luck with your next adventure!

Hey [Name], remember when we ordered food 3 times a day? We will always remember all the inside jokes AND the food you brought to the table. As you did here, you'll kill it in your next role. Stay in touch, and keep in touch!

You're leaving some big shoes to fill, both in terms of work and entertainment value. We'll miss your wit and charm around the office, but we're excited to see you take on new challenges. Best of luck, and don't forget to send us some memes occasionally!

It's been a pleasure working with you, [Name]. You’ll be missed very much, even your lame jokes. But we're happy to see you move on to bigger and better things, and we know you'll succeed wherever you go. Stay cool, and don't forget to drop by for a coffee or a beer sometime!

Farewell Messages for Office Managers

Hey there, boss! Sad to see you go but know you're off to bigger and better things. You've been an awesome leader and an even better friend. Thanks for making work feel less like work. We'll miss you and wish you all the success in the world!

As you embark on your next adventure, thank you for being an amazing manager and colleague. You've always been there to guide us and support us. We'll miss your humor and energy, but we know you'll crush it in your next role. Keep in touch!

It's hard to say goodbye to such an incredible leader. You've taught us so much about teamwork, communication, and leadership. We'll always cherish the memories we've made together. Best of luck in your next endeavor!

We will miss your positive energy and contagious enthusiasm. You've been a true inspiration to us all. We're excited to see what the future holds for you. Farewell, boss!

It's bittersweet to say goodbye to someone who's been such a great boss and friend. You've always been there to lend an ear, offer advice, and motivate us. Your impact on this team won't be forgotten anytime soon. We'll miss you but are also excited for you and all the adventures that await. Stay in touch!

via GIPHY

You've been more than just a manager to us - a mentor, a cheerleader, and a confidant. Apart from our working relationship, you've made work feel like a second home. Best of luck in your new role!

Saying goodbye is never easy, especially when it's to someone who's positively impacted our lives. You've been an amazing leader and a true inspiration. We'll miss you, but we know you'll achieve great things. Keep in touch, boss!

Working under your leadership has been an honor and a privilege. You've always challenged us to be our best selves and to push our limits. We will miss your wisdom and humor. Best of luck in your future endeavors, and please keep in touch!

You're one of the coolest managers we've ever had, and we'll miss your upbeat personality and ability to make us laugh. You've made work fun, and we're grateful for all the memories we've made together. We're excited to see what's next for you and wish you all the best.

Thank you for all you've done for the team and us as you embark on your next adventure. You've been a great listener, a fantastic coach, and a true friend. You've always had our backs. We wish you all the happiness and success in the world. Keep in touch, boss!

Farewell Messages for a Favorite Office Colleague

via GIPHY

Goodbye, my friend! I'll miss our daily coffee runs and pretending to work while we chatted in the break room. Keep in touch and don't forget to send me a postcard from your new job.

Working with you has been an absolute pleasure, even if you stole my lunch several times. Just kidding! I hope your next job is everything you're looking for and more.

Sad to see you go, but excited for your next adventure! Don't forget to pack your sense of humor, positive attitude, and impressive work ethic.

Wishing you the best of luck in your new job and hoping your new coworkers are at least half as awesome as we are. We'll miss you, but we'll always have those team-building exercises to look back on.

It’ll be a little hard coming to the office without your charm. Thank you for spreading joy and laughter even on the most boring days. Congratulations on spreading your wings further, and all the best. Don’t forget to visit us!

I can't believe you're leaving us! Who am I going to gossip with now? Just kidding, we talked about the weather mostly. You'll be missed, and I hope your new coworkers appreciate your puns as much as we did.

It's been a pleasure watching you grow and succeed in this job, and it's hard to imagine the office without you. Remember, you can always come back and visit us.. but maybe don't bring that terrible pineapple pizza you love.

It's not goodbye; it sees you later! I can't wait to hear about all the amazing things you will accomplish in your new job. Don't forget about us little people when you're running the company.

You're leaving us? But who's going to bring us doughnuts on Monday mornings now? Seriously though, you've been a great coworker and an even better friend. We'll miss you, and we hope you find the perfect job.

It's been an honor working with you and an even bigger honor trying to beat you in office ping pong. You'll crush it in your new job, and we'll cheer you on from here. Goodbye for now, and don't forget to come back and visit.

Funny & Short Farewell Messages

Adios amigo, don't forget to send a postcard from your new job!

Goodbye and good riddance! Just kidding, we'll miss you.

So long, and thanks for all the coffee runs!

Farewell, my dear coworker. May your next job be filled with free snacks and endless coffee.

Don't forget to leave a few pens for the rest of us! Good luck in your next job.

Au revoir, mon ami! Don't forget to bring back some croissants from your new job in France.

We'll miss you like a printer misses paper. Just kidding, we'll miss you.

Goodbye, my favorite coworker! Please don't forget to water the office plants before you go. After all, the plants will miss you too.

Farewell, friend, and don't forget to write a Yelp review of your new job.

We'll miss your jokes, smile, and a stapler. Good luck, and please stay in touch!

Farewell Message to Coworker/Mentor

You were more than a mentor to me. You were a guiding light in the office. Thank you for illuminating my career path.

Saying farewell to you feels like the end of a chapter. I know the lessons you taught me will continue to guide my journey. Thank you for all the lessons.

It's not just your professional guidance that I'll miss, but also the laughs and coffee breaks we shared. You made work a joy.

Even though it's hard to see you go, I'm excited for you to spread your wings and soar to new heights. You'll be missed dearly.

As I reflect on our time together, I realize that I gained both a mentor and a friend. Thank you for your support and encouragement.

You took me under your wing and showed me the ropes, but you also showed me kindness and empathy. You're a rare gem; I'm lucky to have worked with you.

I'm grateful to have had you as a mentor but also as a sounding board and confidante. You always knew just what to say to ease my worries.

It's hard to describe how much you've impacted my life and career. You've been a role model, mentor, and friend all rolled into one.

You've been a steady hand in a sometimes turbulent workplace. I'll miss your level-headedness and wise counsel. Wishing you continued success.

Farewell to the person who taught me that success isn't just about what you achieve but also how you treat others. You're a true inspiration.

Casual & Friendly Farewell Messages

via GIPHY

Hey buddy, it's gonna be weird without you around the office. Thanks for all the good times and inside jokes we shared.

Dude, I can't believe you're leaving. You're gonna kill it wherever you end up next. Keep in touch, okay?

Hey, pal, you made work tolerable with your jokes and memes. We're gonna miss your humor and infectious personality around here.

Girl, it's been a blast working with you! You always kept things interesting; we'll miss your energy and positive vibes.

Hey, man, thanks for being a great colleague and friend. We'll need to catch up over some drinks soon.

I'll miss your random dance breaks and office karaoke sessions. Good luck on your next adventure!

It won't be the same without you, my friend. Thanks for all the late-night brainstorming sessions and for being my sounding board.

I can't believe you're leaving, my dude. You were the best coworker a person could ask for. I'll miss our coffee runs and lunch dates.

Thanks for being the yin to my yang at work. You always kept me grounded and made the long days more bearable.

Your contagious laughter and positive attitude made work feel like a second home. We'll miss you, but keep in touch!

Farewell Message to Coworker from Upper Management

It's with a heavy heart that we bid farewell to a truly exceptional leader. Your guidance and vision will be missed, but we know you'll excel in whatever you pursue next.

Thank you for your unwavering commitment to excellence and for pushing us all to be our best selves. You leave behind a legacy of hard work, dedication, and integrity.

Your expertise and experience have been invaluable to our organization, and we are grateful for all your contributions during your time here. You've left big shoes to fill.

Great leaders are hard to find, and you’re one of them. Please know that your leadership and vision will continue to inspire us all. We wish you the very best in your future endeavors.

Your strategic thinking and innovative ideas have helped shape the direction of our company, and we are grateful for the many ways you have contributed to our success. We'll miss you!

You've been a true mentor to many of us, and we've learned so much from your wisdom and guidance. Thank you for being a champion for our team and for leading by example.

Your professionalism and work ethic has set the bar high for all of us, and we will strive to live up to your legacy even in your absence. Best of luck in your new role!

We're sad to see you go but excited for you as you embark on a new chapter in your career. Your leadership and influence will be missed, but we know you'll achieve great things wherever you go.

It's rare to find someone with a combination of talent, drive, and vision. Your contributions to our company have been immeasurable, and we'll always be grateful for the time we spent working with you.

Wrapping Up

Saying goodbye is hardly ever easy. Similarly, colleagues and co-workers leaving can be a sad business. Sometimes, keeping it light-hearted does the trick. Hope to have covered it all; these messages will help you brush up on your tips for writing farewell letters.

Avoid getting too personal while saying goodbye to a coworker via email. Never drop taunts or double-meaning texts. (Especially if you don’t like them.)
